attributes.action: General Election within 6 months of any PM being replaced as party leader
attributes.additional_details:
Our next PM will be chosen for the Tory membership, Theresa May was chosen ONLY by MPs ( although did go to the country and lose the majority), Gordon Brown was chosen by the Labour party only. 

The PM needs a mandate from the country, not from its party only.
attributes.background: A change in leader resulting in a change in PM also results in the manifesto mandate being lost by the new leader or they are hamstrung by their predecessors promises. Similarly, despite being a constituency democracy, people do vote for leaders, that's why we have leaders debates on National TV.
